creator: Alexander.roscoe@gmail.com
text:
I believe "mod_dir" uses the the SERVER_NAME variable to redirect the webpage
with a trailing slash.  I believe it should use the HTTP_HOST variable. 

This messes up parked domain names because it will change the domain to the main
domain on the account. An example here

"http://www.latenightboston.com/test" will go to
"http://www.latenightphilly.com/test/index.php"

"http://www.latenightboston.com/test/" will go to
"http://www.latenightboston.com/test/index.php"

http://www.latenightboston.com parked on top of 
http://www.latenightphilly.com
